data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

requestBody.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse API Trace

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.
